messages.message: For the 'Support' feature, do we auto-populate some of the fields for a given issue (things like users email address using the AI Hub account we redirected from)? If a user signs into Zendesk, will they remain signed in every time they hit Support so that their ticket is linked to their account? In cases where the user has signed in, do we then auto-populate some fields?

if a user is already signed into Zendesk, i assume that the created ticket will be linked to their account

i’m not sure though since i don’t have a customer account, so i’ve never tried it out :disappointed:
The link is https://support.instabase.com/hc/en-us/requests/new so I don't think we will autopopulate any field
